core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Can we get the next flight leg from the scanned boarding pass?

core:action.core:comment: Don't return fail if its data error otherwise new transaction will not run the default transaction type.
TODO Need to get more clever with multiple legs

core:assignAction.core:comment: Default the airport code from the boarding pass if available

core:action.core:comment: Test to see if we can get the next leg from the boarding pass and skip prompt if so.

core:promptState.core:name: Capture Forward Flight Code
core:promptState.core:comment: Capture forward flight code or capture flight code when no menu used.

core:state.core:comment: Test that the boarding pass flight leg from airport matches the from airport code. If there are multiple legs, search for a matching leg.
